title: Platform Stabilization Day 3 Complete
description: Day 3 objectives achieved: Additional .env cleanup completed, N8N deployment script created (API endpoint issue noted), 2 missing workflows created (content-generation, database-sync), MCP server issues documented (Canva needs token, Slack needs permissions), comprehensive 300+ line platform documentation created, platform state updated to reflect 98% automation readiness and 90% week 1 completion. All major Day 3 deliverables completed successfully.
